title: Establishes crime of aggravated rape
summary: Creates the offense of aggravated rape when a person engages in sexual intercourse or deviate sexual intercourse by forcible compulsion and such intercourse results in serious physical injury or is committed by a person who agrees with another to cause the performance of the same or is committed during the commission of an assault, homicide, other sex offenses, kidnapping or related offenses.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to aggravated rape
